name: Adventure Of Stickman: Fly In The Sky Free
name_original: Adventure Of Stickman: Fly In The Sky Free
description:
Stickman wants to fly in the sky, but planes keep flying around to disturb him. Can you help him?

Highlights:
•Addictive gameplay
•Fall from the sky
•Easy and fun
•Well-designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center Support
•It’s FREE!!!
